mpicxx  -O3  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/iPIC3D.dir/iPIC3D.cpp.o  -o iPIC3D  -Wl,-rpath,/media/sf_shared_linux/hdf5/lib:/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib libiPIC3Dlib.a /media/sf_shared_linux/hdf5/lib/libhdf5.so /media/sf_shared_linux/hdf5/lib/libhdf5_hl.so /media/sf_shared_linux/hdf5/lib/libhdf5.so /media/sf_shared_linux/hdf5/lib/libhdf5_hl.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so
